title: Crowdfunding investment confirmations (Kickstarter, Indiegogo)
dataVerified: Backer name, project, pledge amount, reward tier, delivery estimate
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents crowdfunding fraud (fake backer confirmations, altered pledge amounts). Domain binding verifies platform. Tamper-evident pledge record. Dispute resolution (non-delivery claims). Consumer protection.
